answers.answer: Everyone is different. I have only gain about 7kg which is about 15 lbs I will be 38 wks tomorrow.

Ha, I gained 25kg in my first pregnancy. Everyone's body supports it's pregnancy different and that includes weight gain. I never had any complications, my doctor was never concerned, and I had a healthy 8.5lb baby girl. By 5 months postpartum I had lost all of it with exercise 5x a week and eating clean. Good luck!

With my first i gained 50lbs i wasnt eating healthy foods and ibwasnt active. My second pregnancy i was slightly more active and ate a little better and only gained 26lbs. This time im pretty darn active and eat healthy so we will see. But all pregnancies react different. But try eating more veggies and fruit and leaneats and go on daily walks even if its hard 20 minutes a day will help a lot.

You hear so many different thing's. I think it's completely different for every person as to its the beginning of a different individual. Also every pregnancy is completely different. My first was kinda outrageous because of diabetes. But gained 80lbs. This my fifth 36 week's along 48lbs. v

question: I've gained about 18kg so far and I'm just 31weeks. Has anyone experienced such weight gain. Do i need to get worried or its normal
title: My weight.
